roleset.name: make clear or explicit
roleset.note: EXPLICATE-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: elucidate (37.1.1) (from explicate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: All arguments + manner
example.text: She explicated it all to me in Japanese.

roleset.name: graphic to the point of being potentially offensive
roleset.note: EXPLICIT-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from explicit.02-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: It's instrumental music by Mozart and I was very amused to be asked to declare whether the lyrics were 'explicit' or 'clean'.

roleset.name: clear, detailed
roleset.note: EXPLICIT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, explicate-v.01. (from explicit.01-j)

example.name: arg0
example.text: while i 'm psyched that we are at least ending one war , all the news articles are pretty explicit , we are ending the war not because the Us gov't wanted it to end , but because the Iraqi gov't refused to let us stay .
example.arg: While I'm psyched that we are at least ending one war
